pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction Intervals with Random Forests and Boosted Forests // Implements various prediction interval methods with random forests and boosted forests. The package has two main functions: pibf() produces prediction intervals with boosted forests (PIBF) as described in Alakus et al. (2021) arXiv:2106.08217 and rfpi() builds 15 distinct variations of prediction intervals with random forests (RFPI) proposed by Roy and Larocque (2020) doi:10.1177/0962280219829885.
